文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_003_chunk1
证据片段: In hexagonal close-packed metals, the development of a strong deformation texture is caused by the reduced availability of slip systems, their nonsymmetrical distribution, and the fact that twinning obeys strict, crystallographic orientation relationships.

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_003_chunk1
证据片段: By knowing the relationship between texture formation and reduction parameters, it is possible to tailor the texture in Zircaloy tubing within the given limits, according to in-service requirements.

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_003_chunk1
证据片段: In all hcp metals for cold-deformed semi-finished products, as for example wire, sheet, or tubing, the final orientation of the basal plane (0001) is more or less parallel to the direction of deformation.
